name: Basic Cleaning
description: Includes vacuuming, dusting, and surface sanitizing.

name: Standard Cleaning
description: Basic cleaning plus kitchen and bathroom deep clean.

name: Deep Cleaning
description: Extensive cleaning including baseboards, windows, and appliances.

name: Move In Cleaning
description: Perfect before moving into a new place. Includes all deep clean services.

name: Move Out Cleaning
description: Designed for end-of-lease cleanup to secure your deposit.

name: Green Cleaning
description: Eco-friendly products used to clean your home safely.

name: One-Time Cleaning
description: For special occasions or guests coming over.

name: Seasonal Cleaning
description: Ideal for spring/fall cleaning and organizing.

name: Post-Construction
description: Cleans up all dust and debris after renovation or construction.

name: Window Cleaning
description: Streak-free interior and exterior window cleaning.

name: Carpet Cleaning
description: Steam carpet cleaning with stain treatment.

name: Appliance Cleaning
description: Includes refrigerator, oven, and microwave cleaning.

name: Bathroom Detailing
description: Tiles, grout, and fixtures deep cleaned.

name: Pet Hair Removal
description: Removes fur from upholstery, carpets, and corners.

name: Customized Cleaning
description: Tailored services to fit unique client needs.
